item.title: Spotify now lets you share what you’re streaming in real time with friends
item.description: You can tap a friend’s listening activity to play the track, save it, open the menu, or react with an emoji.

item.title: WhatsApp rolls out new group chat features, including member tags
item.description: You can choose a tag that gives others in the group chat more context about who you are.
